original_title: Biboy Banal: Pagganti Ko Tapos Kayo
overview: Binoy played by Jeric Raval is your typical woman's hero, in this case, his woman love and his sister who are constantly plagued by the cruelty of bystander men drinking in the corner store. Binoy attempts at all times to save the poor and hapless through his fighting prowess which he most certainly got from his father (Vic Vargas). He does not hold a job, he most certainly isn't rich and yet he wants to save the world somehow from its injustice to the marginalized.
title: Biboy Banal: Pagganti Ko Tapos Kayo
